title: Stocks Fall As Heightened Geopolitical Worries Zap Risk Appetite
description: The comeback in US equities from last week’s artificial intelligence jitters petered out on Thursday as tensions with Iran put traders on edge.
content: The comeback in US equities from last week’s artificial intelligence jitters petered out on Thursday as tensions with Iran put traders on edge.
